title: today
text:
These are the materials for the SoCal RUG Hackathon 2023-04 tutorials. In this tutorial will you learn:

Basics of text mining with tidytext
The effect of text preprocessing
How to fit a predictive model in tidymodels
Use textrecipes to construct features form text
